author: adityapatwardhan
body:
The webhook for build completion is called after the test_script phase
hence we needed to publish code coverage artifacts before that. Moved the
logic for compression and publish the artifacts after running tests.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @daxian-dbw Can you have a look at this? The call needed to be moved as per appveyor documentation: https://www.appveyor.com/docs/build-configuration/ for build pipeline.

title: Moved publishing of code coverage artifacts to test_script phase
